main.description: Young and popular, this playful American female voice is perfect for trendy content

researcher.description: This young adult female voice delivers sunny enthusiasm with a quirky attitude

engineer.description: A professional woman with a pleasing alto pitch

architect.description: Young adult woman with a confident and warm, mature quality and a reassuring, confident tone

designer.description: Clear and engaging, friendly woman with a British accent suitable for e-learning

artist.description: Velvety female British voice delivers news and narrations with warmth and clarity

pentester.description: A young Australian male with a confident and energetic tone

writer.description: Easy going and perfect for casual conversations
